com.corajr.loom.time

Class RealTimeScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.corajr.loom.time.Scheduler
      • com.corajr.loom.time.RealTimeScheduler

  • public class RealTimeScheduler
extends Scheduler
    Author:
    corajr This Scheduler plays back pattern events as close to real time as possible.

      • play

        public void play()
        Description copied from class: Scheduler
        Start playback. Must be called before querying the scheduler!
        Overrides:
        play in class Scheduler

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Description copied from class: Scheduler
        Stop playback. Additional queries to the scheduler will throw an exception until Scheduler.play() is called again.
        Overrides:
        stop in class Scheduler
